front.title: An Extension to the Presence Information Data Format - Location Object (PIDF-LO) for the Timezone of a Presentity

abstract.t: The Presence Information Data Format - Location Object (PIDF-LO) lacks an indication for the timezone offset of a particular presentity is in. This document extends the PIDF-LO for including such an XML element.The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT","SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in thisdocument are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119 [RFC2119].
